about_the_game:
"Don't Ask the Succubus" is a yuri novel in mystical setting, mix of 2D and 3D images.

Two witches, young impulsive Aurora and cold precise Erica, had to call succubus for finding "Stone of Shadows", the powerful artifact, which helps to free Erica's former partner from Interworld. But the cunning succubus has completely different plans.
Especially about Aurora.
The succubus is enclosed in circle and cannot use magic - unless she provokes witches to use their power. Each use of magic near the circle gradually destroys its defense.

At the beginning of novel, the player plays as succubus.
It depends on you how skillfully succubus will make indecent proposals, arrange provocations, tempt witches and resist attempts to find out where the artifact is hidden.
Let's see whether the succubus will escape, or maybe even have fun with one of the witches?

Features:
– Mystical 3D environment;
– Switch to First Person View;
– Inscription of magic symbols for spells;
– Fights against ghosts and demons in 3D space.

"Don't Ask the Succubus" is a yuri novel in mystical setting, mix of 2D and 3D images.

Two witches, young impulsive Aurora and cold precise Erica, had to call succubus for finding "Stone of Shadows", the powerful artifact, which helps to free Erica's former partner from Interworld. But the cunning succubus has completely different plans.
Especially about Aurora.
The succubus is enclosed in circle and cannot use magic - unless she provokes witches to use their power. Each use of magic near the circle gradually destroys its defense.

At the beginning of novel, the player plays as succubus.
It depends on you how skillfully succubus will make indecent proposals, arrange provocations, tempt witches and resist attempts to find out where the artifact is hidden.
Let's see whether the succubus will escape, or maybe even have fun with one of the witches?

name: Don't Ask Succubus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window7, Windows10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel GMA
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window7, Windows10
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: better than Intel GMA
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

short_description: "Don't Ask the Succubus" is a yuri novel in mystical setting, mix of 2D and 3D images. The light humor of the narrative turns into the heat of passions and terrible challenges for heroines.
